name: Basement
description: Basement is a strategy game, where you play as a desperate scientist who chose the wrong path in his life. That path seemed easy, but turned into a deadly one. You have no choice but to build the most effective enterprise and stay alive in a cruel world of illegal business.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
